movie.title: Not Reconciled
movie.description_intro: An entangled story which details the lives of a German family throughout their various generations.
movie.description_full: An entangled story which details the lives of a German family throughout their various generations.

movies.title: Shut In
movies.summary: Steven is a troubled kid from Maine being sent to boarding school. While his father, Richard Portman, is driving him there, they get into a bad argument, and the car swerves into oncoming traffic, killing Richard and putting Steven in a vegetative state. Six months later, Richard's mother, Mary, is taking care of his every need. Mary is a psychologist who works from home with children and adolescents. She is upset to learn that one of her patients, a deaf child named Tom, is to be transferred to a school in Boston. Later, Mary discusses Steven with her therapist, Dr. Wilson. While she feels guilty, she has decided to put Steven in a home to be cared for because he is no longer there and is just a body.

Six months later, Richard's mother, Mary, is taking care of his every need. Mary is a psychologist who works from home with children and adolescents. While she feels guilty, she has decided to put Steven in a home to be cared for because he is no longer there and is just a body.

movies.title: Night of the Demons
movies.summary: On the night of Halloween, 10 teens decide to go to a party at an abandoned funeral parlor. "Hull House", rumored to be built on an evil patch of land & underground stream, is the place. While starting the party, the teens gather around a big mirror to perform a seance...BIG MISTAKE. They awaken some evil force and find themselves trapped and taken over one by one. Now it's a battle for who can survive and cross over the stream before going to hell....

movies.title: The Sense of Wonder
movies.summary: Louise, a widow with two children, almost crushes a stranger with her car. She takes care of him, even if he's not really wounded. It turns out that he has mental disorders and that they can help each other much more than they thought.

movies.title: Shanghai Grand
movies.summary: Love for the same woman threatens the friendship of two 1930s Shanghai gangsters.
movies.description_full: Love for the same woman threatens the friendship of two 1930s Shanghai gangsters.
